remarks: Bidirectional conversion between an implicit class substitution hypothesis ` x = A -> B = C ` and its explicit substitution equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
csbiebg.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
csbiebg $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( x = A -> B = C ) <-> [_ A / x ]_ B = C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
